name: Anime Crush Mania
description:
Anime Crush Mania is a classic match 3 game which purposes you to engage in a challenge that will certainly captivate your attention and concentration.

How to play

Match 3 similar anime bottle caps to release them.

Try to match more at the same time for more bonuses like the bomb or the red Star.

Get a higher score to advance to the next level.

TIPS:

1. Bombs blow away everything around them.

2. The STAR blows the entire row and column.

3. Yellow stripes over the anime girls blow away vertically or horizontally the entire row or column.
